author: jleroux
msg: Fixes "Secure URL when reading messages (readmessage?communicationEventId)" (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-4017) - OFBIZ-4017
To simplify the macro, I have also used a javascript call for the newmessage request even if it was unneeded (no event or service call)
